context_bundle.summary: Claude Desktop Electron app issues - performance problems, debugging, optimization attempts.

onboarding.quick_start: Config: $env:APPDATA\Claude\claude_desktop_config.json - set RUST_LOG=error for MCP servers
common_patterns: 1GB+ RAM idle for a text box
60 second freeze rendering MCP debug output
Notice-level logging by default kills performance
isUsingBuiltInNodeForMcp: false to use system Node.js
MCP server env vars: RUST_LOG=error, Logging__LogLevel__Default=Error
known_errors: Zod schema explodes on null id (JSON-RPC notification spec compliant but Desktop crashes)
Built-in Node.js slower than system install
Log files grow to 50MB+ causing slowdown
